Can you be that One?? Get started now

Dont worry! it happens.Please enter the mail address associated with your account

"The "Recruitment Race Application" is an innovative platform designed to enhance the student recruitment process by providing a comprehensive evaluation of student achievements and fostering a competitive environment among students. The application allows students to create detailed profiles, including a simple bio and a range of accomplishments such as CGPA, global certifications, normal certifications, and project work. The application assigns specific weightages to different achievements to ensure a balanced assessment: CGPA (40%), global certifications (20%), normal certifications (15%), and projects (25%). These weighted scores are normalized to generate a rank for each student, facilitating a fair and equitable comparison. Additionally, the application features a dedicated login for placement heads, enabling them to upload information about internships and recruitment opportunities and shortlist candidates based on a comprehensive view of their qualifications. This platform supports a more inclusive and effective recruitment process, aligning student capabilities with recruiter requirements."
Note⚠️:Wait until receiving toast \'File uploaded successfully\' to upload another file \'Or\' Update uploads
